name: Box-Up
description:
Made for the Wowie Jam 3.0 ( FAILURE IS PROGRESS)

Controls

 



Description
  • Box Up is a unique retro platformer where your previous failures can be used to complete a level.
  • Use the remains of your previous character to help you progress the
    level. Build a tower, a bridge, or unleash chaos by creating lots of boxes in each level.
Assets

All music, art, and code was made by Kylan Haffie during the game jam.
Background Music available on SoundCloud
